website_summaries.verdict: High quality, lower price alkaline water machine that also removes up to 99.99% of chlorine, lead, and fluoride.
pros: Better pH results (higher) than expensive machines
Reverse osmosis (RO) mineralizing purifier adds essential minerals back into the water that most reverse osmosis machines leave out
Can help with acid reflux and houseplant growth

customer_reviews.title: Best alkaline and filtered water,!!
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this water system for the alkalinity , after installing it I did a alkalinity test and it turns out that this product makes 10.0 if not better alkaline water also I used a digital PPM meter and it showed a 0.22 as far as contaminants in the water I compared this to a alkaline machine which are worth about $3,000 plus dollars, And the results I found for the price of this filtering system is far better and cheaper then an alkalizing machine. I am definitely looking into buying a secondary system for my house I would definitely recommend one of these filtration systems,,, excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: MAX

customer_reviews.title: Massive amount of water waste!
customer_reviews.text: The water tastes great but watching the water waste leave the ststem is enough to make me think twice. i'm not sure i can allow that much water to be wasted while i only drink a gallon or two at most. literally because of my home and sink opperation i had to put the drain outside the wall and it comes out steady and non-stop..... if i keep seeing it i'm gonna have to remove it because i'm trying to lower my Carbon footprint and still be healthy. This system is not for anyone who is worried about wasting or the water bill.
customer_reviews.author: jesse nelson

customer_reviews.title: No more heartburn, avid reflux and our house plants are growing
customer_reviews.text: Most of my family has been dealing with heart burn and acid reflux for a few years now. We used to have a bottled water company deliver to us. But we got this system and did a ph test on it and found out that the bottled water was very low ph. This filter system raised our ph level and we no longer have heart burn or acid reflux. Who would have thought it was our drinking water. Also, we've started watering our house plants with this, plants that were doing ok but not massive growth. They are now growing like crazy. This filter system is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Cole

customer_reviews.title: Good but PH is too high
customer_reviews.text: This is a great system, BUT, Ph is 10.2-10.4. too high for good health. Seems like there is no way to adjust it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Not a happy review
customer_reviews.text: I had received this product almost 2.5 months back and couldn't install it due to my local and international travel.. But as i returned and then fixed this unit to check if I get the water totally purified, I was in for a horror story. The Water from faucet is SO Bitter that you can't even think of drinking it and its one hell of pathetic outcome. My bad situation that I am stuck with this product because this can't be returned now; But definitely NOT something that I would ever recommend to anyone. AVOID this Product at all times
customer_reviews.author: Mayank Trivedi

customer_reviews.title: Turned my water to acid
customer_reviews.text: I had to remove the reverse osmosis part of the filter. The company sent me an additional alkaline charging filter but it still came out acidic. My well water was already 10.** ph alkaline. After this system it turned acidic. So I ran it through the whole system without the reverse osmosis and having two alkaline chargers and it came out to 9.** Ph. Not really sure what is wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Swogger

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this filter. I read prior reviews about it wastes water. Mostly all alkaline water has to release the old water with the new. I have had this for a few months and my water bill has remained the same and I use it a lot. I am so grateful to have bought when I did because it was right before covid and it has literally been a life savor. I have saved so much money on water and even my dogs get to drink this good water and their health has improved and skin coat improved. Love, Love, Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pattyc0211

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Engineering
customer_reviews.text: As a handyman this is about the 15th I've installed but the first I ordered. Usually I put in name brand from the local HD. This unit is designed thoughtfully. The directions are thorough. It knocks the Brit on it's tail. The tank is bigger, comes with more filtration, and even includes things for longevity such as clips to hold the compression connections tight and spare o-rings. I haven't been this impressed by any product in awhile. Two weeks ago I put in a junk Brit and let's just say this thing blew it out of the water. Ha.
customer_reviews.author: NYfree83

customer_reviews.title: Been great except for we had to send back the lower ...
customer_reviews.text: Been great except for we had to send back the lower housing due to some leakage. The customer service was pretty good and they sent a replacement right away with a return envelope to send the defective parts back. It's been working great, but we have another small leak. Not sure where it's coming from yet. Other than the occasional small leaks, its a great product. Great tasting, very oxygenated water. We felt healthier after the first day! Thanks for the great customer service! That's hard to find!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: I picked the right place to buy
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem maintaining pressure with my system, after calling support, (Talked to a real person) they discovered that I had a bad Blatter it was replaced fast. The system has been perfect since. This company has a great work ethic, and a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Denny Birch

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, but tight fit under my small sink.
customer_reviews.text: Barely fit under my sink, but easy installation; took me 2 hours because I had to maneuver the drain pipes and cut them. Had to stand the filters up in order to fit everything. I'm glad the tank is pressurized otherwise I couldn't use the system because the tank won't fit standing up in my case. I like it so far, used it for a week. From the tap I get 7.5pH and 280ppm, after this filter I get 9.5pH and 28ppm. My wife loves the water and so do I.
customer_reviews.author: Mister K

customer_reviews.title: Best investment
customer_reviews.text: Best decision we ever made. We love our system! We had to do ours a little different because we live in apartments - but we love our home water and truly hate drinking water outside of our house because it truly tastes wonderful! Best investment ever! My husband had a tough time with a few aspects of installation- but he never did any kind of plumbing - and he watched videos and finally called for tech support and voila we were set up. So just take installation slowly and carefully and anyone should be able to handle putting it together...
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra P

customer_reviews.title: Great Tasting Water for a fraction of the price
customer_reviews.text: Installation took about an hour. We were on a community well but the water was so chlorinated that we decided to get a filter system. Quotes from a local water testing company were very pricey, so we decided on this one. Glad we did - set up was fairly simple and the cost was 15% of the estimate that the "water technician" gave us. The water tastes great and I'm drinking more water than I used to. My pug loves it too! He's even drinking more water. Would definitely recommend this (I already have to parents and neighbors).
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Minor anoyances, but good over all.
customer_reviews.text: Two complaints: 1) a periodic bad cup of water. Every so often a singke cup full of water tastes bitter / off which is strange as it comes from a 4 gallen reservoir. Why only one cup?!? 2) we could only tie the drain in the vertical pipe between the sink and the P-trap and it is super noisy when the tank replenished. The gurgley noise echoes throughout the house. On the positivep side, It does have good flow and pressure!
customer_reviews.author: vonTaus

customer_reviews.title: and that one sink has a garbage disposal, they recommend that you do not mount ...
customer_reviews.text: Before you purchase this item, you may run into this installation problem. If you have one sink, and not two sinks, and that one sink has a garbage disposal, they recommend that you do not mount the drain hose on to the one and a half inch pipe coming off of the garbage disposal. This is the only option for me since my garbage disposal connects to the bottom of my sink, and I only have one sink. However I gave them a call, and there is a workaround even for one sink. Absolutely great product and great customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Low price better quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm an actual sales man for water softener and RO systems. I just installed this unit with the simple instructions that are supplied. Very very easy just follow the color coded pictures and water lines. I definitely will recommend this product and actually upset this product to my customers. All RO systems have the same filters inside why spend more for a better looking product when you won't even see it. Save hundreds by buying this unit.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Money Saver.  Great Tasting Water.
customer_reviews.text: The unit was easy to install. At first, we are not able to get rid of the fish taste and smell even after flushing the system several times. Contacted tech support and they sent me a replacement RO filter the next day. Problem was solved and we are loving our new filter system. I was very impressed how Express Water handled and resolved my issue. Definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Otto Matic

customer_reviews.title: Finally a GREAT alternative to Essentia
customer_reviews.text: this is a great water RO system , the first couple days the water taste like fish , that was my own fault tho ....so when the system is ready to run you need to let it run for 5-10 minutes to flush the filters and the tank , i only did it for 2 minutes and thats why i had horrible fish taste , but now the water taste exactly like Essentia water , what i was looking for in a RO system . Install took me 30 minutes , everything is pre connected so its pretty much plug and go
customer_reviews.author: George butler

customer_reviews.title: Great product that produces clean great tasting drinking water.
customer_reviews.text: Great product that produces clean great tasting drinking water. Easy to install and it's a well built system. The only issue that I had with this system is that there are no install instructions or maintenance instructions that come with this unit as you need to go onto there web site to read them and or to print them off as like I did. So for that reason I give it a 4 start rating.
customer_reviews.author: 2008_H3_Hummer_#1_DJE

customer_reviews.title: Love this unit! Water taste great
customer_reviews.text: To make it the easiest for your install I highly recommend watching the video provided in the listing..... it’s at the end of all the photos... my dad and husband started to attempt the install without watching the video... after listening to them go back and forth about what goes where I sat them down and insisted they watched.... install went very smooth after and they referred back to the set up video from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: Aftin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Definitely changes the taste of the water off the softener/ well. Only thing you need to do do before turning on the water is check all connections including the ones hooked up at the factory. then do a leak check for a day or two. The leak valve is a simple genius idea. Though i would hold off putting the paper wad in it, that shuts it off the water, until you have it all leaked checked or you will replace them pretty quick.
customer_reviews.author: Berryman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install - Great water in no time.
customer_reviews.text: I had looked at much more expensive systems (e.g. Kinetico $995 on sale) with cartridge replacements at $200/yr. This system was easy to install. Cycle the tank 4 times and I have great tasting water with the cost of ownership (initial purchase and yearly cartridges) being significantly less than other brands. Every time I had a question, the staff was very helpful and answered the questions (rare in this day). So far very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Bagwell

customer_reviews.title: Customer service all the way.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this system over a year ago. I had issues with a cracked canister but when I called the customer service number the customer service department bent over backwards to help me with my situation even though the item was out of warranty they decided to send me a new canister to replace the broken one at no additional cost as well as a pressure gauge to check the water pressure at my house. The customer service agent who is nice and professional and I highly recommend this product based off of the way I was treated in their customer service department.Also the water that comes out of the RO system is both refreshing and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: No tech support number
customer_reviews.text: I really like this filter. The water where I live is very hard and tastes bad. This filter makes it taste like bottled water. I’ve had it installed for about nine months and the water pressure has been great up until now. It is extremely slow at this point. I assume the filters need changing but there is no tech support number listed anywhere so that I can be sure.
customer_reviews.author: MrsSpears

customer_reviews.title: easy to install
customer_reviews.text: easy to install. space is concern if you have a lot of pipes and additional equipment like disposer/ionizer..... so far works good. im using it to filter water for my ionizer. one watch out during installation is to pay attention to manual and tighten the RO filter. if you dont do it, it will leek after few hours and you will have fine time trying to figure it out lol. will update after few months..
customer_reviews.author: Agnes Merzyn

customer_reviews.title: This kit is seriously amazing. We have a well and the water is ...
customer_reviews.text: This kit is seriously amazing. We have a well and the water is horrible - yellow and stinks- and this filter is WONDERFUL. We’ve had pristine drinking water for months with no problems. Install was simple and we can’t live without this filter! Customer service is excellent too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great system!
customer_reviews.text: My old RO system broke and needed a replacement. I definitely recommend this to any person that can use a power drill and a wrench. Everything is pretty straight forward and is even color coded to make it easier to know where to connect what. It also comes with a leak detection which shutts off the system in case of a leak. Water tastes great. Only difficult thing will be drilling a hole into your sink if you don't already have one. Other than that it comes with adapters and all the nessesary components.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher R.

customer_reviews.title: The smell is god awful
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for 5 months, and I'm just going to toss it. You can drink the water straight from the faucet, but if you let it sit for any time, the smell is like fish water. I already sent them an email about it, and they said to flush it. I have flushed it...3 times, over the course of 5 months. I think I have flushed it enough.
customer_reviews.author: A. Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great taste, installation was not too bad, but I'm pretty handy
customer_reviews.text: Great company and the product is a great buy for the price. The instruction manual is easy to follow, but you need to be a bit handy. Took about 2 hours to get it installed. You need to let it run on and off for a couple of days to clear out whatever is in there at first. My kids love it and none of us can tell the difference between bottle water and the filter. Great value and great product.
customer_reviews.author: LayLow

customer_reviews.title: the filtered water has so many impurities
customer_reviews.text: Why does the filtered water have so many impurities, all floating on the surface.The first picture is of filtered water,The second picture shows unfiltered and filtered water。I have flushed the system five times as the instructions. But the situation has not improved. I'm so disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: yuqiu1236

customer_reviews.title: Is it worth the money?
customer_reviews.text: My spouse and I decided to buy this for our house. We have well water and were looking for an additional way to clean our water aside from filling up a filtered container every day. In addition to this we wanted an alkaline water system. We decided on this one. Received it quickly and my spouse got to work to install it right away. It did not take very long to install. Less than one evening was spent installing this Filtration System. The water tastes good. We have never had a problem with our system. We change the filters every 6 months. It was worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: Terribly designed with very cheap plastic. One of the three filter housings would not connect snuggly. Another plastic piece (an elbow connecting the filter to the RO membrane) also would not screw in properly resulting in a pressured leak. All the Teflon tape and ingenuity in the world would not seal this poorly made piece rendering the entire unit unusable. I cannot imagine maintaining this thing down the road by removing/installing various components as the company recommends. Do yourself a favor and avoid this product at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: Royce Renfroe

customer_reviews.title: Fool Proof
customer_reviews.text: It took about an hour and a half from unbox to pressurized system filling up. The instructions really are idiot proof with large full color photos. The water tastes fine so far and there are no leaks. The filters (excluding ro membrane) are recommended to be changed every 6 months so hopefully that doesn't get too expensive twice a year!
customer_reviews.author: Bryce The King

customer_reviews.title: Superior Water!
customer_reviews.text: I have never had better filtered water than from this system. After a couple weeks of drinking this water, you will automatically realize how bad other water tastes! It feels good knowing me and my kids aren't drinking huge quantities of toxic compounds...my water is measuring at 15ppm and a PH of around 7.7!
customer_reviews.author: Beneficial Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: 94 pct TDS
customer_reviews.text: Good product: I have about 500 TDS on Tap and with RO (no Alkaline) I get 30, so 500-30/30 = 94 pct which is very good filtered TDS and with the Alkaline added I get RO at 70 which is excellent. 6/14: I get 10 w/o Alkaline and 24 with Alkaline now. Improved since my installation 4 mos ago.
customer_reviews.author: Sea Slug

customer_reviews.title: It's ok, but it doesn't meet my expectation.
customer_reviews.text: The water never reach the drinkable standard. I called customer service, I feel quite disappointed, he didn't seem very helpful as they promised
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Amazing taste and value
customer_reviews.text: I actually dislike any other water now. This water system is great for the price. It could have cost more and I would buy it all over again. I installed it myself, it was pretty straight forward. I take water to work from my home filter, when I have to refill at work with the filtered water there it’s such a difference in taste. I take water everywhere I go with me now because nothing is as good as my water from home after installing this system. Very pleased all around.
customer_reviews.author: Mymy

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended - On Year Three with the System
customer_reviews.text: I test the water - this works extremely well PPM less than 10 and I didn't change the filters for 2 year and it only went up to 14. A great filter and reverse osmosis system. As good as some that cost 20X (literally) as much. I finally got around to changing the filters. It was very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent system
customer_reviews.text: Instructions went above and beyond in the explanations for installation. Lots of pictures, and every step is thoroughly laid out . Took about two hours, and most of that was removing the old faucet. All parts were sturdy and very high quality. Water tastes great. Haven't had a chance to check the PH level. I was using an alkaline pitcher for about 6 months, which cured my heartburn issues. Since using this filter, I have not had a single issue with heartburn, so I'm assuming the PH level is high enough. Easily worth the investment. I also get lots of compliments from my wife and kids about how much they enjoy the water taste.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: I have used this system for 6 months it works awesome I would definitely recommend this unit very efficient at ...
customer_reviews.text: This RO unit is extremely effective in removing all the impurities, you need to make sure that you change every 6 months . I have used this system for 6 months it works awesome I would definitely recommend this unit very efficient at purifying and cleaning water What a huge difference from city water loaded with chlorine and ammonia this unit purifysit clean .
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I believe it is a good system
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble and in few hours of filtering you are good to go. water taste is different before and after installation. Nothing to complain so far and hope to use it for a long time. Never had to ask for technical help yet. actually I installed it in the basement right under the kitchen sink for easy access. as the water pressure is good there is no issue with water delivery 5 feet above the tank level.
customer_reviews.author: PWan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome water!
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to hook up and the Water tastes better then any water I've ever had. Be sure to follow the directions during the break in stage!
customer_reviews.author: damien givens

customer_reviews.title: Taste, Quality, Ease of use! THIS is the one!
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months of normal use, we could not be more pleased! Great tasting water! Also bought the HM Digital DM-1 in-line Dial TDS monitor. A must in my book. It shows 8-19 ppm compared to 195-256 input. The Faucet they give you is very nicely made and allows us to put even a 5 gal bucket in the sink to fill up. The quality of everything is very good. My parents had RO water system when I grew up but only 5 Stage and did not add good minerals back in like this one does.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne J

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: The technical support is amazing. This is the product to purchase. I don't know if there product is better than other companies, but the tech support makes it the best one to purchase. The assembly was simple since everything is color coded.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Better than our expensive electric akaline water filtration system
customer_reviews.text: Great, great water system! We had a expensive akaline water system but it did taste as good as our daughter's Express water system and our system did test as akaline as the Express water system. The expensive water akaline system we previously owned was rated in the top 20 akaline water systems but it is no match for Express. Our daughters set up this for us. Plus the company's reps actually talk to you on the phone and they are so helpful with any questions you have.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne C.

customer_reviews.title: Alkaline doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: So this thing has been sitting around since we bought it In May. So we installed it and let it run through its process and this thing had a alkaline rating of 5-6. I’m going to order ANOTHER set to see if I just got a bad batch of filters. I doubt they’ll replace the filters for free if I tell them I just installed something in July of 2019 And I bought the house in 2018 May..
customer_reviews.author: justlikefire

customer_reviews.title: Great, except...
customer_reviews.text: Works well but not thrilled about one gallon of filtered water per 4-5 gallons of tap water. Also, the product comes with three cotton pads which are a part of the stop valve. The first two popped within a week or so and we are on the last one already. Seems abnormal to have to replace them so frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works very well rasing ph. Getting over 9ph levels
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. My well water was running 6.2ph and now i am over 9.4ph. Very happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Britt Marcell

customer_reviews.title: Bitter Water
customer_reviews.text: The water was very bitter, i figured it’s the alkaline filter, it was excessive, removed the filter and water tasted fine! The money spent on this extra feature is wasted though. Just buy the regular 5 stage system which is probably more reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Shuai

customer_reviews.title: Best osmosis system
customer_reviews.text: The best osmosis system I’ve ever owned. Great tasting water and easy to install. We had a problem with the water after a couple of days . The taste went chemical. We contacted the company and they gave us instructions to do but that didn’t help. Turns out it was a bad filter which can happen. They immediately sent out a new on and a new alkaline filter and now we are enjoying the best water I’ve ever had and I’m a water snob! Great customer service! Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: No one

customer_reviews.title: other than that I'll see when it comes time to replace filters in 6 months how easy it is
customer_reviews.text: It was installed without a flaw, no leaks as it was initially reported by others. Noisy when it's either filling to tank or draining unto the backwash, other than that I'll see when it comes time to replace filters in 6 months how easy it is..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never Carry Bottled Water Home Again
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy distilled water at the grocery store to avoid chemicals in coffee and tea. The purified water tastes the same as distilled water and my days of lugging around distilled water are over.
customer_reviews.author: Dewayne Hughes

customer_reviews.title: This system is a game changer!
customer_reviews.text: I just installed this about a week ago and we love it! I had a little bit of trouble understanding the installation instructions but then I looked up a YouTube video from the manufacturer and it was really easy to follow. No more buying gallons of water and couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Brittain

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: The RO system install was very easy. I added a permeate pump to my system to help have better water pressure at our faucet and increase the units efficiency. The water is so much better than we had before and it has no issue keeping up with our use. Ice cubes are clear and smooth, with the alkaline filter it is the same as Smartwater out of the faucet. It is so nice not having to buy water bottles any more, now we just use nice insulated bottles when we go out. Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Great water!
customer_reviews.text: Been in use for about a month. Was easy enough to install. Great tasting water. Family of 5 and it seems to keep up with our consumption. Very happy with it so far. We live on a river and our well water is full of iron, 10x gov't recommended level, and stinks. with this system it tastes great and is odorless! No more buying water for coffee or ice for drinks!
customer_reviews.author: Jasen

customer_reviews.title: The system is great. I plumbed it with a by-pass to make ...
customer_reviews.text: The system is great. I plumbed it with a by-pass to make simple water and can also make alkaline water too at different times. To be honest you really only need the alkaline water. I was concerned about the taste when making hot/cold tea and coffee but it tastes great either way. Super easy to install. Great system.
customer_reviews.author: 57tc

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, leaking issues
customer_reviews.text: Water tastes great, I can’t get it to spot leaking at the first filter and at the water reservoir. Followed the instruction from customer service( take it apart and put it back together. ). The tank as gotten better but you can only tighten plastic so much before it breaks
customer_reviews.author: kyle masur

customer_reviews.title: Both Amazon and Express Water are perfect. I was completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect solution for my family need. Easy to install if you follow exactly the instruction which is very easy to understand and follow. Express even gave me a nice brushed nickel faucet. I am very pleased with the system. Anazon was very professional and treated me completely nice. I am awaiting to be able to add a UV filter to the system and of course will be ordered from Amazon. Bottom line is both Amazon and Express Water are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, great water quality
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised I could notice the absence of the chlorine taste from the city water I have been drinking for years. It took me four hours to install my system and two and a half hours to install a friend's unit. My brother bought and is enjoying the R.O. system - his son installed it in 45 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Avidaa

customer_reviews.title: The safety switch is junk, it leaked.
customer_reviews.text: I did not think it was hard to set up. It does take up a lot of space under the sink. Ironically the one item that is to prevent leaks is the only thing I am having problems with leaking, the safety switch. I thought that it was a good idea and it does work, just shouldn't have to use it for itself.
customer_reviews.author: mrbphotography94

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected so far
customer_reviews.text: so far so good its been 2 months and the water quality is great. Its was fairly easy to assemble as well. It was marketed that I would only need to change the filters every 6 months but upon further reviews it sounds like we will need to change out some of the filters 2-4 mon which might be pricey, will update review let you know.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great system
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that my system arrived without a faucet. And how large the tank is, we had to cut out a space to make room for the 3 gallon tank, but the water quality is AMAZING! We have been buying water for years, and have tried several other small systems, this was worth it, would have been perfect if they had a option for oil rubbed bronze faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Consuelo Kotowski

customer_reviews.title: The water in my town WAS barely drinkable now its better than Evian
customer_reviews.text: Item is easy to install, has good flavor, any DIYer can do the install in a couple hours decent pressure from the tank and since i have been keeping up drinking 1-2 liters of water a day... also makes good ice
customer_reviews.author: Cliff E.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, nice water quality
customer_reviews.text: Git it installed in 2h, no problem at all with installation. There was a small leak from the membrane because of overthink cup (it comes pre-assembled so I had to re-do the membrane assembly) but other than that I has no issues (installed 3+ months ago and still happy). I measured a water quality and got about 37ppm which is more than acceptable. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: RV40

customer_reviews.title: Genuinely High pH!
customer_reviews.text: This system actually delivers on its promise. I've had the system for a week and finally decided to test its PH level. As you can see it appears to be about a 10! My last RO system tested at a 5 and was below neutral. In all my years of buying on Amazon I never felt compelled to write a review until now. I guess the only question left is how long it will maintain this level of PH. We shall see!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher W Jennings

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases.
customer_reviews.text: I don't need to carry heavy bottled water from the store. Easy Installation. The water tastes delicious. The test shows that it is healthier than tap water. I recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Blueberry

customer_reviews.title: So happy with it I bought 2
customer_reviews.text: We have well water in our new house and I wasn't happy with the way the water tasted (though I've seen water from a well that's much much smellier lol). We got this and now I'm very happy with the way our water tastes. There was a trip needed to home depot to get a different size fitting, so be aware you may need to do that. The water tastes so good. My fiance's mother was jealous so I bought her one lol.
customer_reviews.author: Angela_GTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: water is amazing
customer_reviews.text: The only negative was small connection of the red lines, there are two of them and it can be confusing when you first read it which red line you are connecting. Study the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony K.

customer_reviews.title: Express Water Customer Service Is Over The Top Good
customer_reviews.text: I spent 6 hours researching RO systems when my old one had the filter canister crack open and water went evey where. he way I research is I call customer service for tech support and ask basic questions like I own one and am looking to buy a new one. Express Water is the only company that gave me straight honest answers. The rep was amazing. I have since used the customer service as I wanted to modify the hose connection diameter and get more tubing. They are the best save yourself frustration and by form them.
customer_reviews.author: Klovefan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing system. I came from iSpring and this system ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing system. I came from iSpring and this system is far superior. The water is delicious and the filters last longer than 6 months with a family of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: Defective compromised filters
customer_reviews.text: Professionally installed, water tastes fishy after taste. RO filter compromised. Amazon offers full refund but I must return item. Which means I have to pay plumber to remove. Very disappointed and do not recommend, customer service from manufacturer is a joke and impossible to get a hold of.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great even at 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Had it about 6 months now. My wife and I love it. Our water isn't too bad but with all the rain being on a private well, dirt has been an issue so we got this. We like our water more than any bottled water now.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic unit
customer_reviews.text: I just don’t write reviews, but this unit is impressive. The water flavor, and even the texture of the water is great is so much better. It is a complex looking system but the instructions and color coding are top notch. We live in an area where we get sick from the water and had to filter even the cooking water, so this unit is an absolute blessing.
customer_reviews.author: Stan R.

customer_reviews.title: Great system
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to install I like the quick connection they were easy to connect. The water taste great. Didn’t need tech support but if I did I’m sure they would of been good
customer_reviews.author: MKF 54

customer_reviews.title: 100% as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for a very reasonable price. Fast delivery, easy to follow instructions. We have used an under the sink dual stage filtration for forty years. We also have a Berkey system for emergency situations. A real and needed step up for daily use.
customer_reviews.author: KAR

customer_reviews.title: We love this water filter system
customer_reviews.text: We love this water filter system! We lived in Louisville Ky and the City water there tasted bad and hurt our whole families stomachs when we would try and drink it. So we ordered this system and my husband installed it. Instillation was fairly quick and he and a buddy were able to drill a hole in our sink for the spout. The water tasted amazing and no more stomach pain!! We just recently moved and are planning to install another system in our new place as we sold our first one with our home.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Baird

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I put in the system in fairly quickly. Everything needed except tools were included in boxes. Directions were complete and easy to follow. The taste and smell difference is astounding. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: L. Bukowski

customer_reviews.title: connector leaking
customer_reviews.text: I installed the system about 10 days ago. It was easy to install but I got a leaking problem when I opened the valve. The leaking connector was from one side of ROM (see attached images). This connector was pre-installed by factory. Finally, I have to take off the hose from the connector and adjusted the position of ROM and then reconnected the yellow hose to the connector again. I think this is a product defect that should not be happened.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ph plus water
customer_reviews.text: Does everything it said it wold and more, very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Banks

customer_reviews.title: Delicious tasting water & very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This RO system comes neatly packaged with well written and illustrated installation, start up, & maintenance instructions. Hoses are color coded and the illustrations are in color so it’s next to impossible to get it wrong. Using this RO system with well water and the drinking water is delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Adame

customer_reviews.title: I dont know what to do .
customer_reviews.text: The PH level is 10.5 which is good but the water has a horrible taste . And gives me dry mouth . I already paid for it to be installed and I dont want to pay again. Does anyone know how to change the taste ?
customer_reviews.author: menashe

customer_reviews.title: We are still open on this, just had it ...
customer_reviews.text: We are still open on this, just had it a couple of months, has a fishy taste, but know problems with the product it self, so time will tell if it is helping us health wise.
customer_reviews.author: LadyBell

customer_reviews.title: water tastes SO GOOD. If only the unit also cooled the water
customer_reviews.text: It took hubby an hour to install, water tastes SO GOOD. If only the unit also cooled the water, but worth every penny for knowing we all have purified water (even the pets)
customer_reviews.author: Angelle41

customer_reviews.title: Great system
customer_reviews.text: This system truly was simple to install, and was probably 50% preassembled. It comes with all of the parts needed for installation (inlet vale, drain, etc). The water tastes really good and not bitter like other alkalizing systems that I've had in the past. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: ziklag

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This is the best water I have ever tasted. The system is easy to install and fills fairly quickly. Much better than the more expensive systems I have had in the past.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Such a great RO
customer_reviews.text: Bought this or our new house. We loved the one we had at our last house so we decided to ply it safe and go with the same brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts on arrival making unit uninstallable.
customer_reviews.text: Unit arrived missing parts so I am unable to install it without going to a hardware store and spend more money and time to replace.
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install took our water form 143 ppm to 43 ppm and if I did not have the Mineral filter to add back some Mineral I am sure the PPM would be zero, I installed in about 45 minutes very simple anyone could do it.
customer_reviews.author: kevin Stone

customer_reviews.title: Disastified
customer_reviews.text: This filter system does not perform as expected, water comes out uncleared, dirtied, cloggy, mixed with unpurities. We tought that it would work better with time but about six days have passed and we still can't get clear and clean water. Total dissapointment and the worse thing is that I also purchased a 3 year filters supply!! I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Edgardo Posada

customer_reviews.title: I would like to know if is defective or is just deceiving
customer_reviews.text: Hi. We bought this product and it does everything that it says it would do. Except that is supposed to get 10 alkaline and is giving 6.2 alkaline. So, I would like to know if is defective or is just deceiving
customer_reviews.author: Francisco H

customer_reviews.title: Easy install-Great water!
customer_reviews.text: Little bit of time to install but the colored pre-attached tubes made it very easy. Love the quality of the water. No more bottled water. Woohoo!
customer_reviews.author: darrylc

customer_reviews.title: leaked and chemical taste
customer_reviews.text: There was a leak, the company replaced the part but it continued to leak from the same spot. There was also a chemical taste that I thought was from the PH+ filter but I removed it and the chemical taste didn't change. I removed the whole system and returned it 😕
customer_reviews.author: doug

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment!
customer_reviews.text: This system is very easy to assemble, step by step instructions. The only disappointment is flushing the system when you install it and again when you replace the filters. It takes about 7-9 hours for this process. I was not happy buying water and don't like the amount of plastic bottles we were polluting mother nature. Plus we have well water and wanted to use what we have for free!
customer_reviews.author: About Face Remodeling

customer_reviews.title: No PFAS for me!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent system. The replacement filters are a little bit expensive but you get what you pay for, as always in life.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Green

customer_reviews.title: Production
customer_reviews.text: So far it's not producing the quantity it was supposed to produce, barely giving 2 to 2 1/2 gallons per day. Installation was easy, the instructions were well explained and easy to follow. The only problem is the production and time it takes to refill the tank, ( about 8 hours) even though my water pressure is well above average.
customer_reviews.author: francisco valdez

customer_reviews.title: Bitter taste & fishy odor
customer_reviews.text: The system was easy to install and the packaging was very organized. Unfortunately, once installed and after following the instructions to drain the tank 4-5 times before drinking...we tasted bitter water with a fishy smell. It was awful! Not at all what we expected. I drained the tank a few more times, but the smell & taste of the water is still bad. I will be returning this product.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Moves Mountains

customer_reviews.title: Doubble check all your conections durning set up!
customer_reviews.text: Whatever you do dont trust that the parts that come put together were done so properly, there was at least 3 places they did not put the hose in properly and I had leaks. After about 2 days it all got sorted out. I know better now!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: No more bottled water
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Have never been a water drinker until now. Clear and crisp tasting water. Coffeeand tea taste so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Carthew

customer_reviews.title: Wish we would have bought one years ago
customer_reviews.text: Husband easily installed the unit. If your picky with water (like myself) then def recommend this filter. Taste so fresh and pure, wish we would have bought one years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Water waster
customer_reviews.text: If you like to waste water this product is for you. Almost 6 gallons of “waste water” to one gallon of purified water. No thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Dick C

product_meta.title: Express Water Reverse Osmosis Alkaline Water Filtration System – 10 Stage RO Water Filter with Faucet and Tank – Under Sink Water Filter – with Alkaline Filter for Added Essential Minerals – 50 GPD
product_meta.description: Make the purest alkaline mineral water with your own home alkaline water system. Great in the kitchen: Improve the taste of your cooking, coffee, ice, and drinks. Experience true Reverse Osmosis purification. Safe filtered fresh tasting H2O: Removes up to 99.99% of contaminants including Lead, Chlorine, Fluoride, Cyanide, Giardia, Radium, Asbestos, Calcite, Heavy Metal, Bacteria, Viruses, Pharmaceuticals, and over 100 other contaminants. Get setup fast with our Quick Connect tubing system. Long lasting filters of the highest capacity standards mean you only need to change your filters every six months. Includes fast flow faucet with 0.8 GPM delivery. A compact system made to fit under a sink in a cabinet. Best for house, apartment, residential, well water, industrial, rv, machine, and office uses. Certified by an independent laboratory to NSF standard 58.Comes with 4 gallon (3.2 gallon water capacity) storage tank and tank stand. Your tank can sit upright or on it’s side to make sure it fits under most kitchen cabinets. Includes all filters needed for setup and first 6 months of use. Can be wall / cabinet mounted or freestanding, made for indoor use. Can be installed undersink, in a basement, or other remote locations, you may need additional tubing or a delivery pump depending on how far away you plan to install or if you plan to link to a refrigerator as well. For every one gallon of water produced the system discharges between one and three gallons (depending on the pressure and quality of your incoming water). The system is compatible with 3/8" and 1/2" under sink connections. Includes filter housing wrench. Operates on 40-80 PSI water pressure, you may need a Booster Pump or Pressure Regulator depending on your water pressure. The water is cleaner and more convenient than any pitcher, faucet filter, or counter top systems. Express Water’s 10 Stage Reverse Osmosis Water Alkaline Filtration System ROALK5D is the complete solution for your drinking water.
feature_bullets: Reverse Osmosis Water Filter: Experience what water should taste like with the Express Water reverse osmosis water filtration system removing up to 99. 99% of Lead, Chlorine, Fluoride, Nitrates, Calcium, Arsenic, Bacteria, and more
Alkaline Water Filter: Express Water’s Alkaline Water Filter with Active Mineral Technology adds Calcium, Potassium, Magnesium, and other minerals to your water

Under Sink Water Filter: Don’t waste money on professional installation. Express Water’s quick and easy-to-understand design means you can install and understand everything about your new water filtration system
Quality : Rest easy with our 1-year on all Express Water Reverse Osmosis Water Systems

Under Sink Water Filter System: No need to mess with refilling or activating your water filter, Express Water’s water filtration systems automatically fill your water tank with high quality drinking water
Leak Detection: Each under sink water filter includes an emergency leak stop detector that shuts off water flow when it detects unwelcomed moisture

Customizable RO Water Filter System: Express Water home water filtration systems are fully upgradable and customizable with quick connecting fittings. Try additional filtration attachments including UV Water Filter, Deionization Water Filter, and more
On Demand Support: Support from experts who can answer any of your questions about your new water filter

specifications.Material: Brass Faucet, Plastic System, Steel Tank
specifications.Included Components: 4 gallon Water Storage Tank ◼ Tank Valve ◼ Deluxe Chrome RO Faucet ◼ All filters
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars643 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
